title: Bug 120922 - "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description:
Bug 120922 - "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement.

When editing XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed, stating that the changes need to be saved. However, it is unclear to the user how to save the changes or discard them. The error message is also not very clear as it simply states "Source page is dirty". Additionally, the dialog showing this error message is titled "Error".

The desired behavior should allow the user to easily understand how to save or discard their changes and improve the clarity of the error message.
OB: When editing XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved.
EB: The user should be provided with clear instructions on how to save or discard their changes. The error message should be improved to provide more accurate information. The dialog title should be changed from "Error" to something clearer.
SR:
1. Open the XML Report Designer.
2. Switch to the "source" view of the Layout Editor.
3. Edit the XML.
4. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view.
5. Observe the error message indicating that the changes need to be saved.
